com.example.project4task2android

Class GetTranslation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.project4task2android.GetTranslation

  • public class GetTranslation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class communicate with the web service using HTTP request/response. First, it send the httprequest to the web service, then web service will deal with the translation part using a translation api(youdao), and finally sends back the translation in a xml format.

      GetTranslation()

    • Constructor Detail

      • GetTranslation

        public GetTranslation()

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                   MainActivity trans)
        search is the public GetTranslation method. Its arguments are the search term, and the MainActivity object that called it. This provides a callback path such that the translationReady method in that object is called when the translation is available from the search.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - the word or sentence that waits to be translated
        trans - instance of MainActivity
